# Coordination Problems

Distributed coordination primitives.

## Problems

| ID | Name | Description |
|----|------|-------------|
| co001 | Distributed Lock | Mutual exclusion lock |
| co002 | Semaphore | Counting semaphore |
| co003 | Read-Write Lock | Reader-writer lock |
| co004 | Barrier | Synchronization barrier |
| co005 | Countdown Latch | One-time barrier |
| co006 | Phaser | Multi-phase barrier |
| co007 | Event Flag | Event signaling |
| co008 | Future | Async result container |
